biolockj.util.r

Class BaseScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.r.BaseScript

  • public class BaseScript
extends Object
    This class builds the base R script used by all standard R Script generating modules. Each script will call the BaseScript via R's source command to make these standard methods and global variables available.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      R function name to get otuTable column indexes based on column names: "getColIndexes"

      R function name to get vector values by element name: "getValuesByName"

    • Method Detail

      • rFunctionGetColIndexes

        protected String rFunctionGetColIndexes()
        This method returns R code for the function "getColIndexes"(otuTable, attNames).
        Extracts column indexes from table otuTable for the given vector of field names (attNames).

        R Function parameters:

        • otuTable = A data.frame returned by read.table( otuFilePath ) for a taxonomy-level OTU table with metadata columns
        • attNames = Metadata field names (must be column names of otuTable)
        Returns:
        R code

      • rFunctionGetFactorGroups

        protected String rFunctionGetFactorGroups()
        The method returns R code for the function "getFactorGroups"( otuTable, metaCol, otuCol ). The OTU column values are split into groups based on their corresponding value in metaColFactorVals. The list returned contains one vector for each unique factor, each containing OTU abundance values related to that factor.

        R Function parameters:

        • otuTable = A data.frame returned by read.table( otuFilePath ) for a taxonomy-level OTU table
        • metaColFactorVals = Metadata column values expressed as factors, created with R code like: as.factor(otuTable[,metaCol])
        • otuCol = otuTable myT column number with OTU counts/abundances
        Returns:
        R code

      • rFunctionGetPath

        protected String rFunctionGetPath()
                           throws Exception
        This method returns R code for the function getPath(rootDir, name).

        R Function parameters:

        • rootDir = Return path root directory
        • name = Base name of the output file

        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to get the pipeline name from the Config

      • rFunctionGetValuesByName

        protected String rFunctionGetValuesByName()
        The method returns R code for the function getValuesByName(vals, name). R method extracts specified p-values as a vector from a data.frame that contain p-values for multiple fields.

        R Function parameters:

        • vals = Values from the data frame
        • name = Metadata field name
        Returns:
        R code

      • rLinesInitScript

        protected String rLinesInitScript(R_Module rModule)
                           throws Exception
        Initialize script, set directories at top of script to make it easy for users to update later.
        Parameters:
        rModule - R_Module
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if propagated by sub-routines

      • rLinesSetLists

        protected String rLinesSetLists()
                         throws Exception
        Set global lists that will be referenced throughout the script
        Returns:
        String representations of character vectors as comma separated lists
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config properties are invalid or missing
